TopicTitle: The KSP 1.0 Grand Discussion Thread: Conquering Space Was Never This Easy!

Steam is updating for me. Log out and completely close steam, then restart it and log back in.

> 
> Love how the momentum from the hype train split of into smaller threads.

Funny, isn't it.
Nope. Just "Server Migration" here. You guys must live in a privileged land.
DOWNLOADING IT RIGHT NOW! 156MB isn't that bad for such an update.

Yay Air Brakes Doors!
